title: Enhancing Instructional Practical Competencies: Learner Support Strategies for Remote Teacher Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify non-academic issues (technical difficulties, work-learning balance, etc.) that occur during remote education and propose resolution strategies.
Learners can suggest improvements to the learner support system by utilizing a peer support network.
Learners can revise and implement personal learning plans based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
